short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick search of Santa Clara County Library catalog

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select any text in your page, right click and select the 'Santa Clara County Library search' to start a search in Santa Clara County library's catalog. This is a shortcut for the following sequence of action: copying the text you want, open the url: http://sccl.org, and paste the text in the top right catalog search box. With this extension you do not need any typing.
